segment.source: MediaCapture is provided to support apps that require low-level control of the media capture process and that implement scenarios that require advanced capture capabilities.
segment.target: MediaCapture is provided to support apps that require low-level control of the media capture process and that implement scenarios that require advanced capture capabilities.

segment.source: Using MediaCapture also requires you to provide your own capture UI.
segment.target: Using MediaCapture also requires you to provide your own capture UI.

segment.source: If your app only needs to capture a photo or video and is unconcerned with advanced capture techniques, the CameraCaptureUI makes it easy to capture a photo or video with only a few lines of code.
segment.target: If your app only needs to capture a photo or video and is unconcerned with advanced capture techniques, the CameraCaptureUI makes it easy to capture a photo or video with only a few lines of code.
